title.rendered: “IDF Responds to False Aircraft Intrusion Alerts and Drone Threats: An Inside Look at Security Measures”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Following the alert of the intrusion of an enemy aircraft into the Matula area a short while ago and into the Kela area in the last hour, this was a false identification.

Also, earlier today, another alert was activated about the intrusion of an enemy aircraft in the north of the country, during which two explosive drones were identified that crossed from Lebanese territory and fell in the Zaura area, no casualties and the event is under investigation.

During the day, a launch was identified from Lebanese territory towards the Matula area, no damage and no casualties.
IDF forces attacked the source of the fire.
